attributes.action: Ban the use of LTTE flag in Public Places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The LTTE(Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam) is a banned terrorist organisation in the U.K. and other countries e.g.Europe,USA,Canada and Australia. 
The use of LTTE flags by the Pro-LTTE supporters in Public place  is an offence and insult to the British and Sri Lanka Governments.
During recent protest in the UK,Pro-LTTE supporters used the LTTE'S terrorist Emblem{FACE OF A TIGER AND TWO GUNS) displayed on a Red LTTE Flag.
As it is an offence to display such banned terrorist flags in public places by these Pro-LTTE groups,I am urging the British Govenment to take immediate action to STOP such Public display of the LTTE's flag being displayed in public places and demonstaations.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
